ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] My first experience with Bard aggro....
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, the cause is sooooo obvious, how could nobody have seen it yet? It s because all us bards are always running around, banging on drums, blowing horns,
ygData.messageBody:
You know, the cause is sooooo obvious, how could nobody have seen it yet?

It's because all us bards are always running around, banging on drums,
blowing horns, flutes, and strumming lutes, and lord knows what else all the
dang time.

All that racket...

Was probably quiet for a long time, until we came along. I have yet to see
any Iksar or Dorf bards in Kunark or Velious...so it was quiet until we came
long!

We're simply too dang loud!

Atonal :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 2:53 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] My first experience with Bard aggro....


I got creamed in Burning Woods in the mid 40's by Bees due to this - they
would just keep coming and coming. Aggro problem never seemed to affect my
non-bard guildmates

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 1:39 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] My first experience with Bard aggro....

Hehe one time I was pulling in DL and got hammered by this bug. I had been
pulling non-stop for about an hour or so. About midway through, I started
to get the "ghost" Mayong faction messages whenever another group killed a
spider. So one time I go out and pull a single spider. There were no other
